title: About FishBase and SeaLifeBase
About the Event
description: FishBase is an electronic encyclopedia founded in 1990 based on catalog cards of commercially important fish. Today, FishBase provides biological and ecological information on 35.800 species of marine and freshwater fish, with approximately 330.300 common names associated with these species, 65.100 photographs, 63.000 references, 2.550 contributors worldwide, and receives around 700.000 visits per month.
